Changelog

----------------

  [Gomez]

* renamed from wpd.mmxi.countdown to wpd.countdown
  [Gomez]

* add german transations [pbauer]

* make link translateable [pbauer]

----------------

* i18n support [erico_andrei]

* Initial release [erico_andrei]
